turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Hello, good morning.”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Good morning! How can I help you today? Are we still talking about the rental property issue, or is there something else on your mind?

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “No, I am talking about internet issue today. Your role is internet owner and you are a repair company. So, I would like to ask about my program related to internet in my housing.”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Got it! I'm here to help with your internet issue. Could you let me know what specific problem you're experiencing right now?

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “My internet has stopped working from today, what can I do?”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Oh, that's frustrating! Let's get it sorted out. First, have you tried restarting your router or modem?

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “There is no signal.”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Got it, no signal

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “in my router and I already on and off it but it don't work.”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: I see, thanks for letting me know. In that case, let's check if there's an outage in your area. Could you share your address or the area you're in so I can look it up?

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “It is Crawley Park.”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Thank you for that. I'll check if there's any known outage in Crawley Port. In the meantime, have you noticed if any of the indicator lights on your router are off or blinking differently than usual?

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “It is unusual, it is not, my router is totally off, so I can't do anything.”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: I understand, that definitely sounds like a more serious issue. I'll check for any outages and also see if we need to send a technician over. Could I have your account number or the name on the account, just to confirm your details?

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “OK, my name is Surya. It is on the road to Stirling Highway.”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Thank you, Surya! I'll look up the details for Stirling Highway in Crawley Port and see if there's an outage. I'll get back to you in just a moment!

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Is there a technician available today?”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: I'll definitely check on that for you. If there's no outage, we can arrange for a technician to come out today. Let me confirm and I’ll let you know in just a sec!

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Do I need to reset the modem again?”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: It might help to give it one more quick reset just to rule that out, but if the issue persists, we'll definitely send someone over. Let me quickly confirm the status and get back to you!

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Is there a technician available today?”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Yes, we do have a technician available today. I’ll go ahead and schedule a visit for you as soon as possible. Could you let me know what time works best for you?

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “I am free in evening time, is it okay?”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Absolutely, that works perfectly. I’ll schedule the technician for this evening. If anything changes, I’ll let you know. Thanks for your patience!

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Should I wait here or will someone call me?”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: You can definitely stay at home, and the technician will give you a call when they're on the way, just to confirm the timing. Thanks for arranging this!

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “If the service isn't fixed by today, do I get a refund or credit?”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: That's a great question! If the issue isn't resolved today, we can definitely offer you a credit on your account. We'll make sure you're taken care of!

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Is it possible to change to a different service plan?”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Absolutely! We can look into different service plans for you as well. Once the technician assesses the situation, we can discuss the best options for you.

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Who can I contact if this isn't resolved today?”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: If the issue isn't resolved today, you can contact our customer support team directly, and they'll assist you further. I'll also make a note of your case so you have a direct point of contact.

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: Transcript Unavailable

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: You're very welcome! If you need anything else, just let me know. Have a great day!

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Okay, now...”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: All right, perfect! I'll make
